DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : 1 . To determine incidence vitamin D deficiency among Israeli pregnant woman 2 . To access whether maternal vitamin D status affect infant bone strength . Methods : 1 . Vitamin D level -in cord blood maternal blood 2 . The mother fill demographic nutritional questionnaire The Infants : 3 . Growth assessment infant : weight length head circumference 4 . Bone strength measurement Quantitative Ultrasound ( Sunlight Omnisense 7000/8000TM )
DOC.brief_title: Maternal Vitamin D Status Neonatal Bone Strength
DOC.criteria: motherbaby pair , birth week 3542 . Jewish Arab woman read understand Hebrew . large neonatal congenital defect .
